Comment: This is a national problem, honestly.   I've got mine sorted, of course, but they've extended REAL ID so many times and the messaging has been nearly nonexistent save a few signs at airports/DMVs - for example, when's the last time you saw a REAL ID commercial/PSA telling you the deadline was coming and to get your shit in order?  Most of the country has no idea this is even a thing.
Author: Jaegermeiste

Comment: This is bizarre, my state of Florida rolled out Real ID back in like 2010.  I had to bring in my birth cert and maybe my social security card, it was many years ago - I do remember I had to get my vision checked, so I had to go into the DMV anyway.  They copied my ID papers and BAM, my new DL was Real ID compliant.    NJ cluster f’d this one badly…
Author: cliffotn

Comment: I mean, it's New Jersey. Enough said.   This doesn't surprise me at all about that state.
Author: ITrCool
